dc:title: Conversations on Distributism
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Quotes David Hennacy's distributist ideas--the need for the worker to acquire property, usury, industrialism's faults, and suggested books to read. Keyword: distributism
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 689 1955-06-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
